summary.snippet: "Prices could be a bit lower but the bowl was great and it was pretty filling."
"Fresh ingredients with incredible flavors and great texture combinations."
"Staff is cool beans all around food is great too!"

most_relevant.description:
Food: 3
Staff: 4
Environment: 4

Not the best or good poke but it is what it is for Ann Arbor standards and options. The name of the establishment is… inaccurate but I’ll just leave it at that. Staff were nice though and there’s lots of indoor seating with free self-service water!

If you’re looking for a job I don’t recommend you working here. Francis (hiring area manager) is sketchy and makes false promises when you’re hired (ie: you’ll be training as a manager and get stuck as a dishwasher/ line helper), Laurence (area training manager) is the only decent person there but he’s barely there, And the shift lead sahad, she’s just unpleasant and will regularly bump into you without saying excuse me. Honestly one of the worst group of people and working experiences I’ve come across.

Went for the first time today after saying "I should go in there" since it opened last year. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the bowl. I got the Tuna lover bowl and it was just awesome. Loved the spicy tuna and spicy mayo on top. And the worker who served me was super helpful after I told her it was my first time. Definitely going back to try more things and maybe I'll get adventurous and try to create my own.

The only bad thing I could say is that this large bowl was $15. Pricy, but expected given it's sushi grade tuna.
Great food and great customer service. The workers, Francis and Leanna, are amazing and my friends and I got along with them (and my friend bought a second bowl after that).
They have some good foods with lots of natural flavours.

I got a large spicy tuna crunch bowl. It was wonderfully scrumptious, although I should note did ask to replace the onion with watermelon radish. They let me freely adjust or add anything you want. The people working here were really nice in showing newcomers in how it all works too, so don't be shy!
Awesome. Everything tasted fantastic and the service was perfect. Francis and Leonna are amazing people. Love it!
Francis and Leonna provided an A-1 dining experience. would definitely recommend.
